channel.title: Comments on: Web2Ireland meetup in London – at FOWA

item.title: By: James Corbett
item.dc:creator: James Corbett
item.description: Change of plan for me and Adam - we won't be making it now unfortunately.
item.content:encoded: Change of plan for me and Adam – we won’t be making it now unfortunately.

item.title: By: Alan O'Rourke
item.dc:creator: Alan O'Rourke
item.description: Heading over tomorrow (monday) You can email me or text to 353 86 4034999 if something gets organised. Probably see you there anyway.
item.content:encoded: Heading over tomorrow (monday) You can email me or text to 353 86 4034999 if something gets organised. Probably see you there anyway.

item.title: By: Robin Blandford
item.dc:creator: Robin Blandford
item.description:
Ok - so where & when?!
I'm on 0044 (0)77 5693 0976 in the UK. Back in Dublin this weekend - back online Monday.
See you then.
-Robin.
item.content:encoded:
Ok – so where & when?!

I’m on 0044 (0)77 5693 0976 in the UK.
Back in Dublin this weekend – back online Monday.

See you then.

-Robin.

item.title: By: Alan O'Rourke
item.dc:creator: Alan O'Rourke
item.description: I will be there. Might even have a demo of Toddle to show if anyone is interested?
item.content:encoded: I will be there. Might even have a demo of Toddle to show if anyone is interested?

item.title: By: Daniel Becker
item.dc:creator: Daniel Becker
item.description:
I'll be a FOWA. Be great to have a chance to meet up.
Count me in.
item.content:encoded:
I’ll be a FOWA. Be great to have a chance to meet up.

Count me in.

item.title: By: James Corbett
item.dc:creator: James Corbett
item.description: Actually I will be able to make it. And please add Adam Green of Grazr to the list too :)
item.content:encoded: Actually I will be able to make it. And please add Adam Green of Grazr to the list too

item.title: By: James Corbett
item.dc:creator: James Corbett
item.description: I'll be at the FOWA but not sure if I can pencil in the dinner yet (have a meeting to attend). Can I provisionally book? :)
item.content:encoded: I’ll be at the FOWA but not sure if I can pencil in the dinner yet (have a meeting to attend). Can I provisionally book?

item.title: By: Robin Blandford
item.dc:creator: Robin Blandford
item.description:
Good group coming together so.
How does http://www.porters.uk.com/ sound? It's better than it looks - I've been there for a similar occasion. I can book - but need numbers.
It's in Covent Garden, which is only a couple of stops on the Picadilly from Kensington/FOWA. Serves 'trad english' food, pretty tasty too.
Mind you - I'm happy to meet you all anywhere.
item.content:encoded:
Good group coming together so.

How does http://www.porters.uk.com/ sound? It’s better than it looks – I’ve been there for a similar occasion. I can book – but need numbers.

It’s in Covent Garden, which is only a couple of stops on the Picadilly from Kensington/FOWA. Serves ‘trad english’ food, pretty tasty too.

Mind you – I’m happy to meet you all anywhere.
